vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
Unitroller.fallback (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#2722-2737) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	(success) = comptrollerImplementation.delegatecall(msg.data) (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#2724-2726)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: uint public totalSupply;
vulnerability_findings.message:
CTokenStorage.totalSupply (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#198) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- exchangeRateStoredInternal (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#1609-1627)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: mapping (address => uint) internal accountTokens;
vulnerability_findings.message:
CTokenStorage.accountTokens (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#203) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- balanceOf (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#1444-1446)
	- balanceOfUnderlying (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#1454-1457)

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#1271-1333) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#1297)
	-transferFrom (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#1311)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._addReservesInternal (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#2182-2194):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#2183-2184)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#2190-2191)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._reduceReserves (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#2242-2252):

	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#2243-2244)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#2249-2250)

vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setComptroller (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#2114-2133):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newComptroller.isComptroller(),marker method returned false) (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#2122-2123)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- comptroller (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#2125-2126)

	- _setInterestRateModelFresh(newInterestRateModel) (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#2312-2313)
	State variables written after the call(s):

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.accrueInterest (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#1642-1694):
	External calls:
	- borrowRateMantissa = interestRateModel.getBorrowRate(cashPrior,borrowsPrior,reservesPrior) (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#1659)

	- accrualBlockNumber (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#1685)
	- borrowIndex (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#1686)
	- totalBorrows (ComptrollerScenarioG2.sol#1687)
